ban.success_temporary: ${user} was banned from the server until ${endDate}
ban.success_permanent: ${user} was permanently banned from the server

remove.success: The infraction n¬∞${infractionId} of ${user} was successfully removed.
remove.not_found: The infraction n¬∞${infractionId} for ${user} does not exist.

purge.error_invalid_count: The message count must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.

timeout.error_max_limit: The maximum duration for a timeout is 28 days.

warn.success_banned: ${user} reached the maximum warnings allowed and was permanently banned.

embed.title: Guild Setup
embed.description:
Welcome to Shiveron's setup panel!
Configure how the bot behaves in your server using the menu below.

*Tip: You can rerun this command anytime to adjust your configuration.*

departure_message.label: Departure Messages
departure_message.description: Custom messages for when members join or leave.

prompt.edit_type: Do you want to edit the join or the leave message?
prompt.select_channel: Select the channel where you want to send ${action} messages.
prompt.enter_message:
Enter the new ${action} message. Use:
- ${user} for member name
- ${server} for server name
- ${memberCount} for total members
prompt.temp_voice_channel: Select the channel used to create temporary voice channels.
prompt.auto_ban_count: Enter the number of warnings required to trigger an auto-ban.
prompt.feature_action: Do you want to configure ${feature} or turn it off?
prompt.select_language: Select the language you want to use.

result.success_enable_departure: The ${action} message has been set to "${message}"
result.success_enable_temp_voice: The temporary voice channel creation has been set to ${channel}
result.success_enable_max_warnings: The number of warnings that needs to be reached for the auto-ban feature to trigger has been set to ${amount}
result.success_enable_lang: The language has been set to ${language}
result.error_generic: An error occurred while updating ${feature}. Please try again.

control_message.first_channel: ${user} You will only be pinged this time because this is the first time you've created a temporary voice channel.

embed.title: Voice channel controls
embed.description: You can edit your voice channel as you please by using the dropdown menu below. You can also manually disconnect people from your voice channel by right-clicking them.
embed.footer: These controls can only be used by ${user}.

name.label: Change name
name.description: Change the name of your voice channel

soundboards.label: Toggle soundboards
soundboards.description: Enable or disable the ability to use soundboards

streams.label: Toggle streams
streams.description: Enable or disable the ability to stream and use the camera

activities.label: Toggle activities
activities.description: Enable or disable the ability to use activities

availability.label: Toggle private channel
availability.description: Only people you've added to the whitelist will be able to see or join your channel

messages_kept.label: Change message deletion
messages_kept.description: Modify the amount of messages that are kept in your channel or disable it

whitelist.label: Whitelist someone
whitelist.description: Whitelisted people will be the only people allowed to see or join your channel

blacklist.label: Blacklist someone
blacklist.description: Blacklisted people won't be able to see or join your channel

name.query_name: Enter the new name you want to use for your voice channel.
name.error_length: The name of the voice channel cannot contain more than 100 characters. Please try again with a name that respects this condition.
name.success: The name of your voice channel was set to "${name}". Would you like to set this as the default setting for your voice channels ?

soundboards.success_enable: Soundboards have been enabled in ${channel}. Would you like to set this as the default setting for your voice channels ?
soundboards.success_disable: Soundboards have been disabled in ${channel}. Would you like to set this as the default setting for your voice channels ?

streams.success_enable: Streams and camera have been enabled in ${channel}. Would you like to set this as the default setting for your voice channels ?
streams.success_disable: Streams and camera have been disabled in ${channel}. Would you like to set this as the default setting for your voice channels ?

activities.success_enable: Activities have been enabled in ${channel}. Would you like to set this as the default setting for your voice channels ?
activities.success_disable: Activities have been disabled in ${channel}. Would you like to set this as the default setting for your voice channels ?

availability.success_private:
${channel} is now private. Would you like to set this as the default settings for your voice channels ?
-# You can add and remove people by using the whitelist option in your voice channel controls.
availability.success_public: ${channel} is now public. Would you like to set this as the default settings for your voice channels ?

messages_kept.query_amount:
Enter the new amount of messages you want to have in your calls before they are deleted by the bot
-# You can also enter "none", which will disable this feature
messages_kept.error_value: The amount of messages must be either "none" or a number
messages_kept.success: The amount of messages kept has been set to ${amount}
messages_kept.success_disable: This feature has been disabled successfully

blacklist.query_users: Select the people you want to add to the blacklist of ${channel}. If they are already blacklisted, they will be removed from it.

whitelist.query_users: Select the people you want to add to the whitelist of ${channel}. If they are already whitelisted, they will be removed from it.

set_default.success_update: The default settings of your voice channels were updated.
set_default.success_not_update: The default settings of your voice channels were not updated.

temp_voice.owner_change: ${user} This channel's ownership has been transferred to you, and all your settings have been applied.

MG-43_Machine_Gun.name: MG-43 Machine Gun
MG-43_Machine_Gun.description: A machine gun designed for stationary use. Trades higher power for increased recoil and reduced accuracy.

APW-1_Anti-Materiel_Rifle.name: APW-1 Anti-Materiel Rifle
APW-1_Anti-Materiel_Rifle.description: A high-caliber sniper rifle effective over long distances against light vehicle armor. This rifle must be aimed downscope.

M-105_Stalwart.name: M-105 Stalwart
M-105_Stalwart.description: A compact, low caliber machine gun. Trades power for ease of use, with faster reloading than heavier machine guns.

EAT-17_Expendable_Anti-Tank.name: EAT-17 Expendable Anti-Tank
EAT-17_Expendable_Anti-Tank.description: A single-use weapon specialized for damaging vehicle armor. Discarded after every use.

GR-8_Recoilless_Rifle.name: GR-8 Recoilless Rifle
GR-8_Recoilless_Rifle.description: A recoilless rifle effective against vehicle armor. Includes support backpack required for reloading.

FLAM-40_Flamethrower.name: FLAM-40 Flamethrower
FLAM-40_Flamethrower.description: An incendiary weapon for close range. Will ignite targets, terrain, and any flammable teammates.

AC-8_Autocannon.name: AC-8 Autocannon
AC-8_Autocannon.description: A fully-automatic cannon effective against light vehicle armor. Includes support backpack required for reloading.

MG-206_Heavy_Machine_Gun.name: MG-206 Heavy Machine Gun
MG-206_Heavy_Machine_Gun.description: A very powerful but difficult-to-wield machine gun with intense recoil.

RL-77_Airburst_Rocket_Launcher.name: RL-77 Airburst Rocket Launcher
RL-77_Airburst_Rocket_Launcher.description: Fires a rocket that detonates within proximity of a target, and deploys a cluster of explosive bomblets.

MLS-4X_Commando.name: MLS-4X Commando
MLS-4X_Commando.description: An expendable missile launcher equipped with four laser-guided missiles.

RS-422_Railgun.name: RS-422 Railgun
RS-422_Railgun.description: An experimental weapon which prioritizes armor penetration. Must be charged between shots - choose targets carefully.

FAF-14_Spear.name: FAF-14 Spear
FAF-14_Spear.description: An anti-tank homing missile which must lock onto its target before launch. Effective against large and armored enemies.

StA-X3_W.A.S.P._Launcher.name: StA-X3 W.A.S.P. Launcher
StA-X3_W.A.S.P._Launcher.description: A versatile missile launcher loaded with seven lock-on homing missiles. These can either be fired from the launcher directly or as an airburst. Includes support backpack required for reloading. Produced by St√•l Arms.

Orbital_Gatling_Barrage.name: Orbital Gatling Barrage
Orbital_Gatling_Barrage.description: A barrage of high explosive rounds, fired from the Destroyer's high speed rotary autocannons.

Orbital_Airburst_Strike.name: Orbital Airburst Strike
Orbital_Airburst_Strike.description: A projectile which explodes while airborne, creating a deadly rain of shrapnel. Not effective against heavy armor.

Orbital_120mm_HE_Barrage.name: Orbital 120mm HE Barrage
Orbital_120mm_HE_Barrage.description: A precision artillery salvo over a small area, perfect for taking out concentrated enemy units.

Orbital_380mm_HE_Barrage.name: Orbital 380mm HE Barrage
Orbital_380mm_HE_Barrage.description: A prolonged barrage, wreaking extended destruction over a large area. Communication with teammates is advised.

Orbital_Walking_Barrage.name: Orbital Walking Barrage
Orbital_Walking_Barrage.description: A linear artillery barrage which moves at intervals, driving the enemy out from cover while allowing an advance.

Orbital_Laser.name: Orbital Laser
Orbital_Laser.description: The Destroyer's laser cannon will sweep over the designated area, vaporizing all targets within the effective radius.

Orbital_Napalm_Barrage.name: Orbital Napalm Barrage
Orbital_Napalm_Barrage.description: Launches a prolonged barrage of napalm shells over a wide area, setting a swath of land ablaze in mere moments.

Orbital_Railcannon_Strike.name: Orbital Railcannon Strike
Orbital_Railcannon_Strike.description: A high-velocity railcannon round fired at the largest target in close proximity to the beacon. Targeting is automatic.

Eagle_Strafing_Run.name: Eagle Strafing Run
Eagle_Strafing_Run.description: A strafing run of the battlefield to clear small targets, delivered almost instantly. When called, the strike will start from the beacon and go away from the direction you were facing when thrown.

Eagle_Airstrike.name: Eagle Airstrike
Eagle_Airstrike.description: A barrage of bombs creating a non-targeted carpet of explosions. When called, the strike will be perpendicular from the direction you were facing when thrown.

Eagle_Cluster_Bomb.name: Eagle Cluster Bomb
Eagle_Cluster_Bomb.description: A targeted air strike unable to destroy buildings, but efficient at clearing smaller targets. When called, the strike will be perpendicular from the direction you were facing when thrown.

Eagle_Napalm_Airstrike.name: Eagle Napalm Airstrike
Eagle_Napalm_Airstrike.description: A barrage of napalm bombs, creating a wall of fire which will stop the enemy in their tracks. When called, the strike will be perpendicular from the direction you were facing when thrown.

LIFT-850_Jump_Pack.name: LIFT-850 Jump Pack
LIFT-850_Jump_Pack.description: Enables the user to jump higher than 'gravity' and 'safety' would normally allow. Must be charged before use.

Eagle_Smoke_Strike.name: Eagle Smoke Strike
Eagle_Smoke_Strike.description: A barrage of smoke grenades, creating a thick smoke screen to block enemies' line of sight. When called the strike will be Perpendicular from the direction you were facing when thrown.

Eagle_110mm_Rocket_Pods.name: Eagle 110mm Rocket Pods
Eagle_110mm_Rocket_Pods.description: A barrage of rocket pods, which the Eagle pilot will release on the largest target near the stratagem beacon.

Eagle_500kg_Bomb.name: Eagle 500kg Bomb
Eagle_500kg_Bomb.description: A large bomb obliterating almost any target close to impact. Make sure to clear the area.

M-102_Fast_Recon_Vehicle.name: M-102 Fast Recon Vehicle
M-102_Fast_Recon_Vehicle.description: A lightly-armored reconnaissance vehicle mounted with a heavy machinegun.

TD-220_Bastion.name: TD-220 Bastion
TD-220_Bastion.description: A heavily-armored tank destroyer armored with a 120mm high-velocity cannon and a heavy coaxial machinegun.

Orbital_Precision_Strike.name: Orbital Precision Strike
Orbital_Precision_Strike.description: A single precision shot from the Destroyer's 'ATLAS' cannon.

Orbital_Gas_Strike.name: Orbital Gas Strike
Orbital_Gas_Strike.description: A projectile which releases a cloud of corrosive gas, harmful to both organic and robotic lifeforms.

Orbital_EMS_Strike.name: Orbital EMS Strike
Orbital_EMS_Strike.description: A "compliance weapon" to modify enemy behavior. The projectile temporarily stuns all targets within the strike radius.

Orbital_Smoke_Strike.name: Orbital Smoke Strike
Orbital_Smoke_Strike.description: Creates a large, thick smoke screen to block targets' line of sight.

E/MG-101_HMG_Emplacement.name: E/MG-101 HMG Emplacement
E/MG-101_HMG_Emplacement.description: A manned fortification offering superior firepower against lightly armored targets. Slow to turn, so place it wisely.

FX-12_Shield_Generator_Relay.name: FX-12 Shield Generator Relay
FX-12_Shield_Generator_Relay.description: A stationary energy shield which provides cover against projectiles. Has a limited lifetime once deployed.

A/ARC-3_Tesla_Tower.name: A/ARC-3 Tesla Tower
A/ARC-3_Tesla_Tower.description: A turret which fires electrical charges at targets in close range. To avoid friendly fire, remain prone.

E/GL-21_Grenadier_Battlement.name: E/GL-21 Grenadier Battlement
E/GL-21_Grenadier_Battlement.description: A stationary ballistic cover with a mounted grenade launcher. Can protect multiple Helldivers from small arms fire.

MD-6_Anti-Personnel_Minefield.name: MD-6 Anti-Personnel Minefield
MD-6_Anti-Personnel_Minefield.description: Deploys a defensive anti-personnel minefield, to halt enemy advance.

B-1_Supply_Pack.name: B-1 Supply Pack
B-1_Supply_Pack.description: Supply boxes containing ammunition, with a backpack that allows the user to distribute boxes to fellow Helldivers.

GL-21_Grenade_Launcher.name: GL-21 Grenade Launcher
GL-21_Grenade_Launcher.description: A grenade launcher effective against armored infantry. Not intended for use against vehicle armor or fortified buildings.

LAS-98_Laser_Cannon.name: LAS-98 Laser Cannon
LAS-98_Laser_Cannon.description: A laser weapon firing a continuous beam. Doesn't require ammunition, but will need heat sink replaced if it overheats.

MD-I4_Incendiary_Mines.name: MD-I4 Incendiary Mines
MD-I4_Incendiary_Mines.description: Deploys a defensive incendiary minefield, which will set both terrain and targets alight when triggered.

AX/LAS-5_Guard_Dog_Rover.name: AX/LAS-5 "Guard Dog" Rover
AX/LAS-5_Guard_Dog_Rover.description: An autonomous drone equipped with a laser rifle, providing 360¬∞ cover. Returns to backpack to cool down.

SH-20_Ballistic_Shield_Backpack.name: SH-20 Ballistic Shield Backpack
SH-20_Ballistic_Shield_Backpack.description: A backpack which can be wielded as a one-handed ballistic shield, protecting against small arms fire.

ARC-3_Arc_Thrower.name: ARC-3 Arc Thrower
ARC-3_Arc_Thrower.description: Projects an arc of lightning at close range. Charges up to project bolts, and may discharge through multiple targets.

MD-17_Anti-Tank_Mines.name: MD-17 Anti-Tank Mines
MD-17_Anti-Tank_Mines.description: Scatters powerful anti-tank mines that deal heavy, armor-penetrating damage. Minefield is less densely packed relative to smaller mines.

LAS-99_Quasar_Cannon.name: LAS-99 Quasar Cannon
LAS-99_Quasar_Cannon.description: Charges up to fire a powerful, explosive energy burst. Has a long cooldown period after firing.

SH-32_Shield_Generator_Pack.name: SH-32 Shield Generator Pack
SH-32_Shield_Generator_Pack.description: Encloses the wearer in a spherical shield which blocks high-speed projectiles. Has a limited lifetime once deployed.

MD-8_Gas_Mines.name: MD-8 Gas Mines
MD-8_Gas_Mines.description: Deploys mines that release gas on activation, temporarily blinding and slowing most enemies.

A/MG-43_Machine_Gun_Sentry.name: A/MG-43 Machine Gun Sentry
A/MG-43_Machine_Gun_Sentry.description: An agile automated machine gun turret. Will fire at targets even if Helldivers will be caught in the crossfire.

A/G-16_Gatling_Sentry.name: A/G-16 Gatling Sentry
A/G-16_Gatling_Sentry.description: An automated turret with an extremely high rate of fire. Caution: does not check if friendly units are in line of fire.

A/M-12_Mortar_Sentry.name: A/M-12 Mortar Sentry
A/M-12_Mortar_Sentry.description: A turret firing powerful shells in a high arc. Effective at long ranges, and able to strike at targets behind cover.

AX/AR-23_Guard_Dog.name: AX/AR-23 "Guard Dog"
AX/AR-23_Guard_Dog.description: An autonomous drone equipped with a Liberator Penetrator assault rifle, providing 360¬∞ cover. Returns to backpack to rearm.

A/AC-8_Autocannon_Sentry.name: A/AC-8 Autocannon Sentry
A/AC-8_Autocannon_Sentry.description: An automated cannon turret firing anti-tank ammunition over long ranges. Sacrifices agility for range and power.

A/MLS-4X_Rocket_Sentry.name: A/MLS-4X Rocket Sentry
A/MLS-4X_Rocket_Sentry.description: A powerful automated turret, effective against armored targets. The turret will primarily aim at larger enemies.

A/M-23_EMS_Mortar_Sentry.name: A/M-23 EMS Mortar Sentry
A/M-23_EMS_Mortar_Sentry.description: A turret firing static field generators that slow the advance of enemies.

EXO-45_Patriot_Exosuit.name: EXO-45 Patriot Exosuit
EXO-45_Patriot_Exosuit.description: The EXO-45 Patriot Exosuit is a heavily armored walking exosuit, equipped with fourteen rockets and a mini-gun preloaded with 1000 ammo.

EXO-49_Emancipator_Exosuit.name: EXO-49 Emancipator Exosuit
EXO-49_Emancipator_Exosuit.description: The EXO-49 Emancipator Exosuit is a heavily armored walking exosuit, equipped with dual autocannons preloaded with 100 rounds each.

TX-41_Sterilizer.name: TX-41 Sterilizer
TX-41_Sterilizer.description: Atomizes caustic chemicals into a fine mist that liquifies sensitive electronics and tissues. Blinds and slows most enemies.

AX/TX-13_Guard_Dog_Dog_Breath.name: AX/TX-13 "Guard Dog" Dog Breath
AX/TX-13_Guard_Dog_Dog_Breath.description: A drone that defends its user by firing caustic gas at nearby enemies. Returns to backpack to refill.

SH-51_Directional_Shield.name: SH-51 Directional Shield
SH-51_Directional_Shield.description: A one-handed device that deploys a wide energy barrier in front of the user. The barrier is semipermeable and blocks high-speed projectiles from the outside only, leaving the user free to shoot through it.

E/AT-12_Anti-Tank_Emplacement.name: E/AT-12 Anti-Tank Emplacement
E/AT-12_Anti-Tank_Emplacement.description: A powerful manned gun emplacement, capable of taking out armored targets at long ranges.

A/FLAM-40_Flame_Sentry.name: A/FLAM-40 Flame Sentry
A/FLAM-40_Flame_Sentry.description: An automated flamethrower turret. Warning: fuel canister prone to explosion when ruptured.

B-100_Portable_Hellbomb.name: B-100 Portable Hellbomb
B-100_Portable_Hellbomb.description: A backpack-mounted Hellbomb that can be armed by the wearer or an ally, starting a countdown. Users are recommended to remove the backpack before the countdown reaches zero.

LIFT-860_Hover_Pack.name: LIFT-860 Hover Pack
LIFT-860_Hover_Pack.description: Offers its user brief fixed-height flight, stable enough for pinpoint marksmanship.

CQC-1_One_True_Flag.name: CQC-1 One True Flag
CQC-1_One_True_Flag.description: The eternal colors of Super Earth can never be tainted. Only quenched, by the blood of its enemies.

GL-52_De-Escalator.name: GL-52 De-Escalator
GL-52_De-Escalator.description: A humane grenade launcher firing high-powered arc grenades.

AX/ARC-3_Guard_Dog_K-9.name: AX/ARC-3 "Guard Dog" K-9
AX/ARC-3_Guard_Dog_K-9.description: A humane, autonomous drone equipped with a modified Arc Thrower. Capable of projecting arcs of lightning through multiple targets. Does not need to recharge between shots.

PLAS-45_Epoch.name: PLAS-45 Epoch
PLAS-45_Epoch.description: A powerful plasma weapon that fires one blast at a time, each blast exploding on impact. Must be charged to fire. Warning: do not overcharge.

A/LAS-98_Laser_Sentry.name: A/LAS-98 Laser Sentry
A/LAS-98_Laser_Sentry.description: A turret that fires powerful and precise laser beams. Will self-destruct after prolonged fire/overloading heat sink.

LIFT-182_Warp_Pack.name: LIFT-182 Warp Pack
LIFT-182_Warp_Pack.description: A Dark Fluid-powered backpack that generates a portable micro-wormhole. This safe and well-understood technology allows the wearer to warp short distances. Warning: do not use while pack is overloaded.

S-11_Speargun.name: S-11 Speargun
S-11_Speargun.description: A speargun that fires anti-tank projectiles. These projectiles release a cloud of gas on impact, and must be carefully loaded one at a time.

EAT-700_Expendable_Napalm.name: EAT-700 Expendable Napalm
EAT-700_Expendable_Napalm.description: A single-use weapon that fires a missile containing napalm cluster bombs that release upon impact.

MS-11_Solo_Silo.name: MS-11 Solo Silo
MS-11_Solo_Silo.description: A silo containing a single, powerful missile and an expendable handheld targeting remote.

M-1000_Maxigun.name: M-1000 Maxigun
M-1000_Maxigun.description: A belt-fed minigun with an exceptional ammo capacity. Cannot be reloaded with standard non-belted munitions.

CQC-9_Defoliation_Tool.name: CQC-9 Defoliation Tool
CQC-9_Defoliation_Tool.description: A useful field-clearing tool for removing trees, obstacles, and unlucky foes.

AX/FLAM-75_Guard_Dog_Hot_Dog.name: AX/FLAM-75 "Guard Dog" Hot Dog
AX/FLAM-75_Guard_Dog_Hot_Dog.description: An autonomous drone equipped with a flamethrower. Returns to pack to refill fuel canisters.

B/MD_C4_Pack.name: B/MD C4 Pack
B/MD_C4_Pack.description: A backpack with six adhesive C4 charges and a wireless detonator set up for either individual or simultaneous detonation.

Reinforce.name: Reinforce
Reinforce.description: Used to call in a Helldiver if they have been eliminated.

SoS_Beacon.name: SoS Beacon
SoS_Beacon.description: Used to get priority on the mission select screen to increase the chances of Helldivers joining and sets the lobby's visibility to public for the rest of the dive. Only usable by the host if there are 3 or less Helldivers present in the dive.

Resupply.name: Resupply
Resupply.description: Used to call in a Resupply.

Eagle_Rearm.name: Eagle Rearm
Eagle_Rearm.description: Used to send Eagle 1 back to the Super Destroyer Ship to resupply. Disabled if Eagle 1 has not expended any payloads or if no eagle stratagems were selected

SSSD_Delivery.name: SSSD Delivery
SSSD_Delivery.description: Used to call in the SSSD Hard Drive.

Prospecting_Drill.name: Prospecting Drill
Prospecting_Drill.description: Used to start the Main Objective of the Conduct Geological Survey Mission.

Super_Earth_Flag.name: Super Earth Flag
Super_Earth_Flag.description: Used to start the Main Objective: Raise Super Earth Flag Mission.

Hellbomb.name: Hellbomb
Hellbomb.description: Used to call in a Hellbomb.

Upload_Data.name: Upload Data
Upload_Data.description: Used to start the Side Objective: Upload Escape Pod Data.

Seismic_Probe.name: Seismic Probe
Seismic_Probe.description: Used to start the Side Objective: Conduct Geological Survey.

Dark_Fluid_Vessel.name: Dark Fluid Vessel
Dark_Fluid_Vessel.description: Event-exclusive stratagem for the Deploy Dark Fluid mission. Deploys a backpack full of Dark Fluid that acts as a more powerful Jump Pack when worn. Must be inserted into the Tectonic Drill.

Tectonic_Drill.name: Tectonic Drill
Tectonic_Drill.description: Event-exclusive stratagem for the Deploy Dark Fluid mission. Deploys a drill to the surface which must be loaded with a Dark Fluid Vessel and then defended.

Hive_Breaker_Drill.name: Hive Breaker Drill
Hive_Breaker_Drill.description: Used to start the Main Objective of the Nuke Nursery Mission.

Cargo_Container.name: Cargo Container
Cargo_Container.description: Used to contain Fusion Batteries and High-Grade Platinum in the Confiscate Assets and Rapid Acquisition Missions.

Orbital_Illumination_Flare.name: Orbital Illumination Flare
Orbital_Illumination_Flare.description: Only found in the Stratagem Hero Game onboard the Super Destroyer.

SEAF_Artillery.name: SEAF Artillery
SEAF_Artillery.description: Unlocked after completing the SEAF Artillery Side Objective. Used to call in an Artillery Strike. Damage and Effect of the strike depends on which Shells were loaded during the Side Objective.

Call_In_Super_Destroyer.name: Call In Super Destroyer
Call_In_Super_Destroyer.description: Used to call in the Super Destroyer for 1 minute during Commando Missions.

error.command_failed: There was an error while executing this command!
error.invalid_time_format: Invalid format. Use an integer followed by: min, h, d, m, or y.

misc.interaction_forbidden: ${user}, you are not allowed to use these buttons.
